text: Eram Garden (, BÄgh-e Eram) is a historic Persian garden in Shiraz, Iran. == Other websites == * https://web.archive.org/web/20140922071450/http://www.eramgarden.org/ * https://web.archive.org/web/20131219025742/http://eramgarden.shirazu.ac.ir/ * Iran Tourism Center: Category:11th century Category:Botanical gardens in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Iran Category:World Heritage Sites in Iran
title: Eram Garden
